With this additional money she will have more sales.  Her income will multiply, and that way she will give her family a better quality of life.

Her achievement is that, thanks to her work, she has purchased items on credit, and she has paid them off well.  Her goals are to be able to get her children ahead, and to generally give them a better quality of life.

loans.use: to stock merchandise and to have orders ready for her customers.

loans.name: Donabel

texts.en:
Donabel is 37 years old and lives in Mohon, Aloran, Misamis Occidental. She is married with 2 children. 
Donabel  is engaged in palay trading activity and earns approximately 5,000 PHP each month doing this type of work. She has requested a loan to be used in purchasing additional sacks of palay for resale. 
Donabel has been a member of PMPC for 2 years. In the future, Donabel hopes to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional sacks of palay for resale

loans.name: Jesus

texts.en: Jesus is 53-years-old, married to a food vendor and blessed with three children. He manages a farming business, particularly rice farming.  With his two hectares farm, he has earned an amount of 120,000 PHP. His profits in this business was spent on school allowances for his son and grandchildren. Due to financial constraints, he would like to use a loan amounting to 50,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers, seedlings, and insecticides. He's hoping that his requested loan will be granted so that he can use his loan and earn more profits.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seedlings and insecticides.

loans.name: Kelvin Isael

texts.es:
Kelvin, se a decidido por otro crédito para poder pagar mano de obra que le ayude a recolectar la cosecha de la siembra de maíz que realizo, puesto que también de ese proceso obtendrá alimento para su ganado. Con el crédito anterior el incremento su ganadería, ha mejorado la raza, tuvo mejores ganancias, el negocio es más estable.
Kelvin tiene una mejor situación económica, ha cancelado sus deudas y por el momento no ha tenido ningún problema familiar o en el negocio que le dificulte seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Kelvin has decided to take out another loan to be able to pay for labor to help him harvest the corn he grew. He will also obtain feed for his cattle from this process. With the previous loan, he increased the cattle he has, improving their breed. He had more profit and the business is more stable.  

Kelvin has a better financial situation. He has paid off his debts and so far has not had any family or business problem that would make it difficult to keep working.

loans.use: to pay for labor.

loans.name: María Félix

texts.es:
María se desempeña como maestra de educación primaria en un colegio rural de la zona donde habita, es soltera, tiene una hija a la que está apoyando en sus estudios universitarios.
Actualmente está presentado la necesidad de la construcción de una cuarto para su hija ya que su vivienda solo cuenta con un cuarto donde su hija ni ella puede tener privacidad,  de esta manera  tener mejor comodidad y estabilidad familiar.  Este crédito lo utilizará para la compra de bloques, cemento y  lo que el pago de mano de obra.
Esta señora hace grandes esfuerzos para darle lo que su hija necesita, apoyándose en el mismo ya que pertenece al sector magisterial que los salarios son bajos y de esa manera mejorar las condiciones y nivel de vida.
texts.en:
María works as an elementary school teacher in a rural school in the area where she lives. She is single and has a daughter whom she is supporting in her university studies.

Right now, she needs to build a room for her daughter because her house only has one bedroom where she and her daughter can have privacy. This way, she can be more comfortable and have more family stability. She will use this loan to buy blocks and cement and to pay for labor costs. 

This woman works very hard to give her daughter what she needs and supporting herself. She is a part of the teaching profession which has low salaries. This way, she can improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as blocks and cement, and to pay for labor costs.

loans.name: María Del Socorro

texts.es:
María  , es madre  soltera, trabaja  en un instituto de la localidad desempeñándose como maestra de educación secundaria con 32 años de labora.
Actualmente esta señora esta presentando una necesidad de comprar un medicamento ya que encuentra enferma
, para poder seguir desempeñando  su labor tiene que estar en buen estado de salud, por tal motivo se presento a la oficina de ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento ya que con este sería el numero 14 y este ultimo lo utilizaría en la compra de medicamento tales como Repostrogen 4D, Estrógenos conjugados, omepracol en   ampollas. Y le agradece y a las demás instituciones que están afiliadas con esta financiera que siempre están apoyando a las personas de bajos recursos.
texts.en: María is a single mother. She works at a local institute as a secondary school teacher with 32 years' experience. Right now, she needs to buy medication because she is ill. In order to keep doing her job, she has to be in good health. That is why she has come to the Ceprodel office to ask for a loan. This will be number 14 and this last one will be used to buy medications such as Repostrogen 4D, conjugated estrogens, and ampoules of Omeprazole. She is grateful the other institutions that are affiliated to this bank that are always helping people of low income.

loans.use: to buy medications such as: Repostrogen 4D, conjugated estrogens, and ampoules of Omeprazol.

loans.name: Valentín

texts.es:
Valentín  de 44 años de edad, se ha dedicado a la siembra de maíz desde muy pequeño; pero la necesidad lo hizo viajar a los  Estados Unidos, estuvo alrededor de 10 años trabajando, para sacar adelante a su familia.
 
 Luego se regreso a El Salvador, porque  su esposa se enfermo y no tenia quien la cuidara, por que los niños estaban pequeños, recogió dinero para mantenerse y continuar apoyando a su familia. Ese capital lo  invirtió en el negocio de compra de ganado y su posterior venta, hasta el día de hoy él sigue trabajando en el comercio de animales. Su esposa vende verduras y esto lo realizan los miércoles, que es el día de comercio del pueblo. Ellos tienen hijos uno de ellos tiene 20 años de edad, y los otro dos tienen 10 y 6 años de edad; el mayor emigro a los estados unidos a trabajar y poder ayudarle a su familia; así como lo hizo su padre.

Valentín compra y vende de ganado y cerdo, a la ves lo buscan para domar bestias mulares y caballos.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a fundación campo, es para el mantenimiento de la frijolera, que tiene sembrada que ya esta por darle los últimos mantenimientos,  para lograr tener una buena cosecha y  vender los granos.


 En el futuro, desea seguir trabajando por la oportunidad que le a brindado, la fundación campo, ya que él a sentido que en otra instituciones no trabajan con la comunidad.
texts.en:
Valentín is 44 years old. He began farming corn when he was very young. However necessity caused him to travel to the United States. He was around 10 years old and worked to help his family get ahead.

Then he returned to El Salvador because his wife became ill and he had no-one to care for her since their children were still small. He raised money to support himself and to continue supporting his family. He invested that capital in a business selling cattle and in 
later sales. Up until today he continues to work in the animal sales business. His wife sells vegetables. They make their sales on Wednesdays, which is market day in their pueblo.

The couple has children, one of whom is 20 years old, while the other two are 10 and 6 years of age. The eldest immigrated to the United States to work and to help his family, just as his father did.

Valentín buys and sells cattle and pigs. At the same time he is sought after to tame mules and horses.

The loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to maintain the beans he has planted and that he is now about to give final maintenance, so that he can reap and sell a good harvest.

In the future, he wants to continue working with the opportunity that Fundación Campo has provided, since he has felt that other institutions do not work with the community.

loans.use: to maintain the beans that he has planted and that now he is about to give their final maintenance.

loans.name: Minh

texts.en: Minh is a 51- year-old, married man living in Ho Chi Minh City. He has three children. His wife earns a living working for a local company. Minh runs a business that sells mattresses and camp beds, which he has done for 3 years. Minh would like to take a loan to buy a greater variety and quantity of mattresses to stock his shop. He hopes this will enable him to better meet the needs of his customers and increase the turnover of his business. He also hopes that through the loan his business will generate a higher income, and will help him to improve his family's living conditions, and enable him to set aside some savings for his children's education.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety and quantity of mattresses, to stock his shop.

loans.name: Marc Jayson

texts.en:
Marc Jayson is a third-year student at La Salle University in Ozamiz City studying for a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration, major in Operations Management. He lives in Sebasi, Clarin, Misamis Occidental with his family. His father is a farmer earning well enough for their daily living. 

Being financially unstable has never stopped Marc Jayson from dreaming. He joined GDMPC and gained access to micro-finance services specifically an education loan that support students who are qualified and want to continue their studies. For the second semester, Marc Jayson borrowed another loan to buy new textbooks , ROTC and school uniforms.  He dreams of finishing his studies and being able to work for a bright future.

loans.use: to buy new textbooks , ROTC and school uniforms.

loans.name: Be

texts.en: Be is requesting a new loan to buy a range of new products, such as travelling shampoos, snack food and beverages, to restock his general store. This purchase will help him to better meet the needs of his customers. His previous loan enabled him to improve his business and offer his customers a greater variety of products. He hopes that his new loan will assist him in adding to the size of his store and increase sales, and will also help him to improve his living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a range of new products, such as traveling shampoos, snack food and beverages, to restock his general store

loans.name: Sarah’S Group

texts.en:
Sarah's group is one of YICE’s women self-help groups in Lwamasanga village, and the group is made up of five members all coming from the same village.  Sarah (2nd from right) is the group leader.  Members of this group grow varied crops like beans, ground nuts, vegetables, Irish potatoes, sweet potatoes, cassava and onions.  They also keep local chickens.

Sarah is 36 years old and grows vegetables, sweet potatoes and cassava.  She also rears some goats.  She has been growing her crops for over the last six years but was getting low yields and income.  After acquiring better farming skills through YICE’s farming-as-business training, Sarah and her group members are applying for a loan to purchase good quality vegetable seeds and pesticides, and to pay for a laborer to clear their gardens.

Sarah believes that applying better farming practices will increase her yields and income by 80%.  She plans to use her profits to establish a goat rearing project and pay school fees for her three children.  Her dream is to support her children’s education up to the university level.

loans.use: to purchase good quality vegetable seeds and pesticides, and to pay for a laborer to clear their gardens.

loans.name: Mary’S Group

texts.en:
Mary’s group has received trainings on better farming practices through YICE’s farming as a business training program, and is one of YICE’s women self-help groups in Namuganga village.  Members of this group grow different crops like beans, maize, cassava, ground nuts and vegetables but work as a team when sowing, weeding and harvesting on their small farms.

Mary (first from left) is their group leader.  She is 30 years old, and married with four children.  She has been farming since she was 12 years old, but she believes that she has never yielded enough because she has always been using poor quality local seeds, poor farming methods and not applying any fertilizers.  

Mary asks for this loan to be able to buy good quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides, and to access more training on better farming methods.  She believes that with this support, her yields will increase and she will be able to help her family and improve her finances.  Her future dream is to educate her children up to the university level.

loans.use: to buy good quality seeds, fertilizers and pesticides and access more training on better farming methods.

loans.name: Bezaida Margarita

texts.es: Bezaida de 46 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y sus dos hijos de 14 y 9 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras cerca del mercado que se encuentra por su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios y la calidad del producto que comercializa, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, Bezaida está solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas frutas y verduras por mayor para poder seguir con su negocio ya que esa es la única fuente de trabajo y así poder obtener mejores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de  vida.
texts.en:
Bezaida, age 46, lives in her own house with her husband and their two children.  The children are 14 and 9, and they currently go to school.  She sells fruits and vegetables near the market by her house.  She has a lot of clientele because of the good prices and the quality of the products that she sells.  With what she gets from her work, she manages to pay the household expenses.

Bezaida is requesting a loan to buy more fruit and vegetables wholesale.  She will do this in order to be able to continue with her business because it is her only source of work.  This way she will be able to get better income and give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and vegetables wholesale.

loans.name: Shilat’S Group

texts.en:
Members of Shilat‘s group have all attended YICE trainings in farming as a business.  These women live in the same village of Namuganga, and also joined YICE’s women self–help groups through which they have acquired better farming skills and offer each other group labor on their gardens in a rotating form.  They grow crops such as beans, ground nuts, and cow peas.  The group comprises of five members, three of which are widows, and one is divorced with two children.  The average age of the group members is 39.

Shilat (first from left) is the group leader.  She is 30 years old with two children.  Shilat is requesting a loan to purchase good quality seeds and pesticides in order to improve on the quantity and quality of her yields and her standards of living in her village.  She plans to sell what she harvests to buy scholastic materials for the family.  Her long term dream is to start up a small retail shop to supplement her income.

loans.use: to purchase good quality seeds and pesticides for their small farming enterprises

loans.name: Yowanina’S Group

texts.en:
Yowanina (2nd from right) lives in Kyakatebe village and is a group leader of one of YICE's women self-help groups in Kyakatebe parish.  Her group consists of five members who are all female farmers but growing different crops like beans, maize, cassava, and vegetables among others.  They also rear some domestic animals like cows, pigs, and goats.

Yowanina is 45 years old, has 6 children and is a widow.  She is the household head and takes on all the responsibilities at home.  She has been a farmer for 25 years, growing similar crops season after season.  Through YICE's farming as a business program, Yowanina and her group members acquired skills in better farming practices.  They appreciate the organization's commitment to empowering vulnerable grassroots women.

Yowanina requests a loan to buy good quality seeds and fertilizers, and to hire local laborers to help her expand her garden.  She plans to use the money acquired after her harvest to pay school fees for her children and buy a cow.  Yowanina’s dream is to become a strong female farmer that supplies the community with good quality farm produce.

loans.use: to buy good quality seeds and fertilizers, and hire local laborers to help them expand their gardens

loans.name: Prossy's Group

texts.en:
Prossy’s group members have been attending YICE’s trainings on farming as business.  This group is one of YICE’s women self-help groups in Kyakatebe village.  Prossy is the leader of the group that consists of five members who all have small farming enterprises.  They grow different crops but work as a team and they help each other on their small farms.

Prossy (first from left) is 30 years old and married with five children.  She has been farming for 13 years and has never yielded enough to cater for her family's food needs.  As a result of YICE’s trainings, Prossy and her group members want to put the skills learnt into practice. 

The group asks for this loan to enable them to buy good quality seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides as well as access more training on better farming methods.  They all believe that with the support of a loan, their yields will increase and they will be able to help their families and improve their finances.  Prossy’s dream is to have enough food for her family and live a good life.

loans.use: to buy good quality seeds, fertilizers, and pesticides, and access more training on better farming methods.

loans.name: Mai

texts.en: Mai is a 35-year-old woman. She has 1 child. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband have been running a business selling clothing and slippers for twelve years. Mai would like to take a loan to buy a greater quantity and variety of clothes to sell. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her existing customers and to attract additional customers. She also hopes that through the loan her business will generate a higher income and will help her to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy a greater quantity and variety of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Sumaira

texts.en:
Sumaira, age 37, is the mother of two children. Her husband's tailoring shop is the only source of income for the family. He has excellent tailoring skills but has only one tailoring machine. Having only one machine makes it difficult to meet the customers' needs in a timely manner. Therefore he is planning to purchase another tailoring machine and a variety of tailoring supplies including thread, needles, clothing, etc. These purchases will help him to continue working efficiently and professionally. 

However due to the lack of money, he finds it difficult to purchase the machine and supplies. Therefore his wife, Sumaira is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan with the goal of helping her husband. The loan will help her husband to purchase the needed items. Sumaira is happy that she will be able to help her husband with the loan. She prays for the success of her husband's business.

loans.use: to purchase another tailoring machine and a variety of tailoring supplies.

loans.name: Lovinsa’S Group

texts.en:
Lovinsa's group is made up of 5 members living in Kyakatebe.  All members of this group rear pigs and keep local chickens; they also grow different crops like beans, cassava, maize and groundnuts.  

Lovinsa (2nd from left) is the leader of the group; she is 40 years old and married with seven children.  She earns her income through the sales of pigs for meat and eggs from her chicken.  She faces a challenge of slow growth in her pigs, which she attributes to rearing local, poor breeds.  Through attending YICE’s trainings in farming as a business, Lovinsa acquired new skills to improve her piggery project.  Her group members are requesting this loan to buy exotic male piglets and good quality seeds to improve their farming enterprises. 

Lovinsa dreams of educating her children up to the university level and supporting her family to live better standards.

loans.use: to buy exotic male piglets and good quality seeds to improve their farming enterprises.

loans.name: Irene's Group

texts.en:
Irene’s group consists of five members all living in Kyakatebe village.  The group members’ average age is 35 years.  Two of the group members are widows who are fully responsible for their families.  Group members grow crops of the similar kind that include beans, maize, ground nuts and tomatoes.

Irene (first from right) is the group leader.  She is 32 years old, with three children, and takes care of three relatives by paying fees for them.  She rears poultry birds for a living, and got trainings from YICE's program farming as a business. 

Irene’s group is asking for this loan to buy better quality seeds, herbicides and fertilizers to improve on their farm productivity.  In addition to this, Irene also wants to breed her chicken to get exotic chickens that would give her enough eggs and increase her income.  Her dream is to have a big poultry farm, supplying eggs to big markets in the Ugandan capital.

loans.use: to buy better quality seeds, herbicides and fertilizers to improve on their farm productivity.

loans.name: Yen

texts.en:
Yen, a 49-year-old married mother of two, lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Married to  a painter, Yen has operated a food stall selling meals to people in their community for the past eight years.

Yen is requesting a loan to purchase new furniture and good quality food ingredients in bulk to make more food to sell from her stall. She hopes this will enable her to better meet the needs of her customers and attract additional customers. 

Yen also hopes that her loan will enable her to increase her income and save money for any future difficulties facing her family.

loans.use: to purchase new furniture and food ingredients for her food stall

loans.name: Chung

texts.en: Chung, 53, is married and has two sons. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. She and her husband earn a living by operating a general store in front of their house. They started this business three years ago. Chung is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying a greater variety of products, especially food and household items, to stock her store and better satisfy her customers. She hopes her business will run smoothly and will generate a higher income.  This would raise her family's standard of living and allow her to save money for the future.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of products especially food and household items.

loans.name: Fátima Del Rosario

texts.es:
Fátima, casada y trabaja en el Mined del municipio desempeñándose como maestra de educación primaria  con 5 años de experiencia y de profesión  Psicopedagoga.
esta señora se presento a ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un financiamiento , lo utilizara en la compra de semolina para el engorde de cerdos, ya que esta es otra forma de obtener otros ingresos a demás de su salario, ya que esto le ayuda  ha tener mayores ingresos y darle mayor estabilidad a su familia y nivel economico
texts.en:
Fátima is married, and she works for the municipal MINED [Ministry of Education] as a primary school teacher.  She has five years of experience, and she is an educational psychologist by profession.

This lady came to Ceprodel to receive the benefit of a loan.  She will use it to buy semolina to fatten the pigs.  This is another way of getting other income in addition to her salary.  This will help her to have greater income and give her family greater financial stability and a better standard of living.

loans.use: to buy semolina.

loans.name: Scovia's Group

texts.en:
Scovia's group is comprised of five women, two of which are widows.  The group member’s average age is 40 years.  All group members live in Kyakatebe, and they are active members of YICE’s women self-help groups.  All members in this group are small scale farmers, growing vegetables like tomatoes, eggplants, onions and green peppers which they sell in their village market.

Scovia (2nd from left) is 41 years old and she has been this group leader for the last eight months.  She earns her income through the sale of vegetables although she believes that she gets less than what she expects due to low and poor quality yields.

Scovia’s group members attend YICE’s trainings in farming-as-business and have acquired better farming skills so that with good quality seeds and fertilizers, their farm yields will increase.  Scovia asks for a loan to buy good quality vegetable seeds and fertilizers, and also to access more training on vegetable and other crop production to increase her yields and income so she can take good care of her family.  She dreams of becoming a model farmer for vegetable growing in her village and to the whole community, and has a vision of training other women in the future.

loans.use: to buy good quality vegetable seeds and fertilizers and also to access more training on vegetable and other crop farming

loans.name: Wendtongo Group

texts.fr:
Mme SOLANGE est responsable du groupe WENDTONGO. Mariée, elle est mère de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 12ans et le moins âgé a 04ans. 02 vont à l’école. Elle a 04personnes en charge.
Mme fait la couture depuis 07ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans le marché de son quartier. Ses clients sont mixte (homme et dame).
Elle veut s’acheter 01 nouvelle machine à coudre.
Mme veut économiser ses bénéfices afin de pouvoir acquérir une autre machine à broder. Elle ambitionne assurer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Solange is in charge of the Wendtongo group. She is married and has 2 children. The oldest is 12 years old, and the youngest is 4. Both of them are going to school. She takes care of 4 people.

Solange has been making clothing for 7 years. She gets her supplies at the market in her neighborhood. She has both male and female customers.

She would like to buy herself 1 new sewing machine. 

Solange would like to save up her income in order to buy another embroidery machine. Her goal is to provide for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy one new sewing machine.

loans.name: Yida Group

texts.fr:
Mme FATIMATA est responsable du groupe YIDA. Mariée, elle est mère de 03enfants. Le plus âgé a 19ans et le moins âgé a 05ans. 03 vont à l’école. Elle a 06personnes en charge.
Mme vend des pagnes depuis 15ans. Elle s’approvisionne au marché du secteur 10 en ville. Ses clients sont les dames et hommes.
Elle veut s’acheter 09complets  pagnes.
Mme veut ouvrir un compte d’épargne avec ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne assurer l’avenir de  ses enfants.
texts.en:
Fatimata is in charge of the Yida group. She is married and has 3 children. The oldest is 19 years old, and the youngest is 5. All three attend school. She takes care of 6 people.

Fatimata has sold pagnes [traditional wrap] for 15 years. She gets her supplies at the Sector 10 market in town. She has both male and female customers. 

She would like to buy herself 9 full lengths of pagne cloth. 

Fatimata would like to open up a savings account with her income. Her goal is to provide for her children’s futures.

loans.use: to buy 9 lengths of pagne.

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh, 51, is married and has two children. She lives with her family in Ho Chi Minh City. Her husband earns an income as a goods delivery man. 

Anh started the business of selling pork pies 18 years ago. She is requesting a loan to expand her business by buying better ingredients to make a greater quantity and variety of pork pies to sell at her shop, and better satisfy her customers. 

She hopes her business runs smoothly and will generate a higher income to assist her in improving her family's living conditions.

loans.use: To buy ingredients to make pork pies to sell

loans.name: Tien

texts.en:
Tien, 26, lives in a small house in Ho Chi Minh City with her family, including two children and her husband. Tien earns money through their business, selling slippers. 


Tien is sometimes unable to provide the volume of slippers required by her customers. Consequently, she would like to get a loan to buy a larger stock of slippers to meet her customers' needs. 

She also hopes her business will ensure that her family members, and especially her children, will have a better education and a better future.

loans.use: to buy a larger stock of slippers to meet her customers' needs.

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose is a 58-year-old farmer from Tipan, Oroquieta City. Through farming, he generates income and provides his family’s needs. Aside from his rice field, he also has a garden that contains various vegetables in his vacant lot, as his fun time activity.


In addition to that, Jose has been a member of Paglaum MPC for two years. He asked the organization for help; they extend their help to him to have additional capital for his farm to purchase farming stock like fertilizers.

loans.use: to purchase farming stock, such as fertilizers.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es: Karla es originaria de la ciudad de Ocotal, de 34 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos. Es de oficio profesional en contaduría pública, se dedica a la contabilidad. Su esposo la apoya económicamente en todo, lo que le ha permitido salir adelante. Su meta próxima es alquilar cuartos. Solicita el crédito para mejorar las condiciones de saneamientos en su vivienda, con el fin de asegurar un entorno más seguro e higiénico. Estima que le crédito será beneficioso ya que podrá renovar la vivienda y brindarle un mejor hogar a su familia. Su plan futuro es culminar la construcción de su vivienda.
texts.en:
Karla is from the city of Ocotal, Nicaragua, 34 years old, married, and the mother of two children. She has a professional career in public accounting and works as an accountant. Karla's husband is her full economic partner as well as her spouse, which has allowed the couple to get ahead. 

Karla's immediate goal is to rent rooms in their home. Karla is applying for a loan to improve sanitation in her home so that she can ensure that it is safer and healthier. Karla believes that the loan will benefit her as she'll be able to renovate her home and provide her family better living conditions. Karla's plan for future is to complete construction of her home.

loans.use: to improve sanitation in her home

loans.name: Pokobila's Group

texts.fr:
Mme POKOBILA est responsable du groupe. Mariée, elle est mère de 06enfants. Le plus âgé a 23ans et le moins âgé a 08ans. 06 vont à l’école. Elle a 08personnes en charge.
Mme est Gérante de buvette depuis 10ans. Elle s’approvisionne dans des caves en ville. Ses clients sont les hommes, les femmes et les jeunes.
Elle veut s’acheter 08caisses de bière et 01caisse de sucrerie.
Mme veut ouvrir un compte d’épargne avec ses bénéfices. Elle ambitionne agrandir sa buvette et assurer la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Pokobila is in charge of the group. She is married and has 6 children. The oldest is 23 years old, and the youngest is 8. All 6 are attending school. She provides for 8 people.

Pokobila has managed a refreshment stall for 10 years. She gets her supplies from cellars in town. Her customers include men, women and young people.

She would like to buy 8 cases of beer and 1 case of sweetened beverages.

Pokobila wants to open up a savings account with her profits. Her goal is to expand her refreshment stall and to be able to provide for her children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy 8 cases of beer and 1 case of sweetened beverages.

loans.name: Rita

texts.en:
Rita, a married mother of three grown children, lives in Loboc, Bohol where she has been engaged in a piggery business for eight years now. It is quite a challenge for her to maintain her business since she has to wait for three to four months to sell her hogs. 

Rita is requesting a loan to buy feed to fatten her hogs as well as more piglets to raise. With this loan, she will be able to focus on looking after her hogs without worrying about the feed needed. In the future, Rita hopes to expand her business and become a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets.

loans.name: Turikumwe Ii Group

texts.fr:
Firmin fait partie du groupe  Turikumwe et  habite à Bujumbura. Il a 38 et est marié à Béatrice. Ensemble ils ont 3 enfants  âgés de 2 à 12 ans, tous étudient.

Il fait le commerce de chèvres  depuis  2 ans. 

C’est son premier  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter beaucoup de chèvres à revendre pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, il  voudrait acheter une parcelle, y construire une maison,  et voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Firmin is a member of the Turikumwe group and lives in Bujumbura. He is 38 years old and married to Béatrice. They have 3 children between the ages of 2 and 12 years old, all of whom attend school.

He has been selling goats for 2 years. 

This is his first loan through Turame. With his loan from Kiva, he will increase his capital and buy a lot of goats to re-sell and earn more money. 

In the coming years, he would like to buy a parcel of land, build a house on it, and see his children get an education.

loans.use: to increase his capital and buy a lot of goats to re-sell in order to earn more money.

loans.name: Luisa Verónica

texts.es: La señora Luisa es maestra de educación primaria, impartiendo clases en un colegio de la comunidad donde habita, es  madre soltera con 3 hijos a los que le brinda todo el apoyo en su educación, esta señora presenta una necesidad urgente como es la construcción  de divisiones de cuartos y cambio de zinc del techo por eso visito las oficinas de ceprodel para ser beneficiada con un financiamiento y poder lograr el objetivo planteado, ya que el mismo será utilizado en la compra de materiales de construcción como: Zinc,  perlines estándar, ladrillos cemento arena, piedrín, hierro corrugado   y liso.de de esta manera mejorara sus condiciones y nivel de vida, agradeciéndole a ceprodel por la oportunidad de realizar su sueño
texts.en:
Luisa is a Primary school teacher who gives classes in the community in which she lives. She is the single mother of three children to whom she gives total support in their education.

Luisa has the urgent need to construct dividing walls and replace the zinc roofing on her house. So she visited the Ceprodel offices to benefit from a loan and carry out her plans. She will use the loan to buy zinc sheeting, wood beams, bricks, cement, sand, gravel and re-bar. In this way she will improve her conditions and standard of living. She is grateful to Ceprodel for this opportunity to fulfill her dream.

loans.use: to buy construction material like zinc sheeting, wooden beams, bricks, cement, sand, gravel and re-bar.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.en:
Ruth is 55 years old and lives in Patawag, Labason, Zamboanga del Norte. She is married with six children. Ruth operates her sari-sari (variety) store to earn a living and has had this business for five years. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP doing this type of work. 

Ruth has requested a loan of 3,000 PHP for additional capital to buy more products to add to her inventory to sell. Ruth is a new member of PMPC joining in 2013. In the future, she hopes to expand her store.

loans.use: buy more products to add to her inventory to sell

loans.name: Nestor

texts.en:
Nestor is 56 years old, married and has two children. He is a farmer who plants and harvests rice to sell. He has been in the farming business for almost 20 years. His wife is a vendor. 

Nestor wanted to improve his farming business but had insufficient funds. That's why he is borrowing a loan of PHP 45,000 to buy fertilizers and pesticides used in farming. The additional revenue gained will be invested in his children's education and farming maintenance.

Someday, Nestor would like to become a productive farmer and achieve better crop production.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides used in farming

loans.name: Mukhtara

texts.en:
Mukhtara is a 40-year-old married woman. Her husband is a driver, and his income is not enough to meet their household expenditure. So a few years ago, Mukhtara started a general store to support her family. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market, as he has maintained many contacts for years. 

Mukhtara is the mother of five children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and health. She wants to grow her business, so she has requested a loan from Kiva's field partner, BRAC Pakistan, to buy packs of sugar, oil and grains to meet the increasing demand at her store. She is expecting a boost in her earnings and dreams of expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: To buy packs of sugar, oil and grains to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Maura Gioconda

texts.es: Maura es una persona ejemplar en su comunidad, de profesión maestra de educación primaria, labora en un colegio del sector donde vive con 21 años de experiencia , es casada con 1 hijo al que le está dando todo el apoyo  para su desarrollo  académico, esta señora visito las oficinas de ceprodel para exponer la necesidad de financiamiento y poder cubrir la misma , de  ponerle el techo y el  piso a cuartos y crear mejores condiciones de vida, ya que dicho desembolso será utilizado en la compra de de materiales de construcción como: zinc, perlines, cemento, arena, piedrín y cerámica,  esta señora merece el apoyo que ceprodel le ha brindado ya que el sector laboral a que pertenece es de un salario bajo y requiere del apoyo de créditos, para  poder ir  mejorando sus  niveles de vida.
texts.en:
Maura is a model citizen in her community. She is a Primary school teacher who works in a school close to where she lives. She has 21 years of teaching experience. She is married and has one child who she supports in his academic development.

Maura visited the offices of Ceprodel to explain her need for a loan and her ability to pay it off. She needs to put on a roof and finish the floors in her house to create better living conditions. The loan will be used to buy construction material like zinc sheeting, wood beams, cement, sand, gravel and tiles. This woman deserves the support that Ceprodel has offered her as the salaries in her profession are low and in order to continue improving their standard of living loans are a necessity.

loans.use: to buy construction material like zinc sheeting, wood beams, cement, sand, gravel and tiles.

loans.name: Eduardo José

texts.es:
Eduardo es un  señor trabaja en un instituto de la localidad, desempeñándose como oficial de mantenimiento con 15 años de laborar para este centro de estudios.
Es casado con 2 hijos a su cargo a los que le proporciona todo su apoyo moral y económicamente para que se desarrollen. La necesidad que hoy en día está presentando señor Eduardo  es la construcción de una cocina. Por tal motivo se presento a la oficina de ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento el cual lo utilizara para la compra de materiales de construcción como8 bolsas de cemento, 5 láminas de zinc, 200 bloques, y 1 quintal de hierro. Lo que le dará mejor nivel de vida a sus seno familiar
texts.en:
Eduardo is a man who works in a local institution as a maintenance official, with 15 years of experience working for this educational center.

He is married and responsible for two children, for whom he provides all his moral and economic support for their development. What Señor Eduardo  needs now is to construct a kitchen. For that reason, he has presented himself at the Ceprodel office to apply for a loan that he will use to purchase construction materials such as 8 bags of cement, 5 sheets of zinc, 200 blocks, and a quintal (about 100 lbs) of iron. This will give a better level of living to his family.

loans.use: to buy 8 bags of cement, 5 sheets of zinc, 200 blocks, and a quintal (about 100 lbs) of iron

loans.name: Ramón Antonio

texts.es:
Ramón es un señor, casado, no tiene hijos, de profesión Maestro de Educación Secundaria y la cual tiene 15 años de desempeñarse en dicha labor.
 Este señor está presentando la necesidad de construir un cuarto, por tal motivo se presento a ceprodel para solicitar su primer financiamiento  y lo utilizara para la compra de materiales de construcción como zinc, perlines, cemento, piedrín, arena, bloques y pago de mano de obra  lo que vendrá a dar comodidad a su hogar..
texts.en: Ramón is a married man with no children. He is a secondary school teacher, and he has 15 years of experience in this work. He is facing the need to construct a room, for which reason he has presented himself to Ceprodel to apply for his first loan, which he will use to buy construction materials such as zinc sheets, purlins, cement, gravel, sand, and blocks and pay for labor. The new room will make his house more comfortable.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials such as sheets of zinc, purlins, cement, gravel, sand, and blocks and pay for labor

loans.name: Elias

texts.en: Elias joined GDMPC in 2012. He gained access to micro finance and it helped him to improve his ability to engage in his business. To make a living, he manages his own rice farm and earns a good living. He borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase fertilizer in order to improve his farm. Elias is thankful to GDMPC for helping him become successful on his farm. In the future, Elias wants to have another plot of farmland to expand his rice fields.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer

location.town: Sto. Niño, Tukuran, Zamboanga del Sur

loans.name: Lubna's Group

texts.en:
Lubna is a member of this three-person lending group. She has asked for a Kiva loan from Kiva field partner, BRAC Pakistan. Lubna lives in Lahore, Pakistan with her family. Her husband owns a spare parts shop in the market where he sells automobile spare parts. 

Currently, he is in need of finance to purchase a variety of automobile spare parts to sell, as his shop's stock is finished. He does not have enough savings to purchase the products needed for his shop.

Therefore, Lubna wants to help her husband with the loan amount. She hopes that the loan will be helpful for her husband to continue his work. She wishes for the success of her husband's business and for a bright future for their children.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of automobile spare parts.

loans.name: Maimuna

texts.en:
Maimuna is a married mother of two children who attend school. She lives in a rental house that has no electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

Maimuna operates a business selling clothes and shoes, selling at the market to her neighbours and passersby. She faces the major challenge of stiff competition in her business. She dreams of expanding and establishing a boutique business in the future. 

With the loan of Kes 50,000 that she is requesting, she wants to purchase bales of clothes and shoes for resale. Maimuna decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bales of clothes and shoes for resale.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is married and lives at Pines, Oroquieta City, Mindanao, Philippines. In order to earn a living, she raises pigs in their backyard. She sells one pig at a time. With the desire to earn more, she decided to raise more pigs so that she can sell more. 

Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative has financed her original heads of piglets & the feed. Now, she requests a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy additional heads of piglets and sacks of feed. Lolita really hopes and prays that her business will grow and benefit her family, in addition to the income of her husband. Someday, she wants to build a concrete pig cage to easily keep more sanitary conditions.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets and feed

loans.name: Linda

texts.en: Linda is 56 years old. and a widow with three adult children. She lives in Mabini Baliangao Misamis Occidental. She engages in a snack vending business and earns 3,500 PHP a month. She has been in this business for 15 years. Linda requested a new loan to purchase kilos of flour and sugar for snack vending. Linda has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC for 13 years.

loans.use: to purchase flour and sugar to make snacks to sell

loans.name: Salim

texts.en:
Salim sells cooked food from home to the general public. She faces the major challenge of seasonality in her business and lack of enough capital for the continuity of the business.

With the KSHS 50,000 loan, she wants to purchase foodstuff like maize flour, wheat flour, rice and sugar for her business. She decided to join Yehu to get financial assistance to improve her business and she appreciates the support.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, rice and sugar for her business

loans.name: María Del Socorro

texts.es: María, es casada, no tiene hijos, se desempeña como maestra de educación secundaria con 15 años de experiencia, además tiene un negocio en su casa de habitación como es la venta  de zapatos, desinfectante y perfumenes de la línea de Avon.  Por lo que está solicitando un financiamiento  y se acerco a la oficina de ceprodel para  ser beneficiada con un crédito para la compra de estos antes mencionado, ya que ella ya tiene su mercado establecido en la comarca donde habita.
texts.en:
María is married, does not have children, and works as a secondary education teacher with 15 years of experience. She also has a business in her house which is the sale of shoes, disinfectants, and perfumes from the Avon line. 

Since she is asking for financing, she went to the CEPRODEL office to benefit from a loan for the purchase of merchandise, since she already has her established market in the region where she lives.

loans.use: to buy shoes, disinfectants, women's perfumes, and colognes.

loans.name: Lina

texts.en: Lina is 37 years old. She is married and has one grade school student. She lives in Mabini Baliangao Misamis Occidental. Lina has been engaged in her sari-sari store business for five years and earns a monthly income of PHP 4,000. She requested a new loan to purchase beverages and various groceries for additional sales to her customers. Lina has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC since 2000 and aims to have more savings for future use.

loans.use: To purchase beverages and various groceries to sell

loans.name: Rosalie

texts.en: Rosalie is a married woman and a mother to a two-year-old child. She is 29 years old and comes from Loboc, Bohol. Rosalie has been engaged in the hog-raising business for five years. Rosalie is requesting a loan to buy piglets to raise and then sell in three to four months time. Through this loan, she will be able to put her plans into action in order to earn more. In the future, Rosalie dreams of expanding her piggery and becoming a successful businesswoman. She will also save for the future education of her child.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Jojie

texts.en: Jojie is 50 years old. She is married and has two adult children, both of whom are married already. Her husband is a private employee. She lives in SWP Calamba MIsamis Occidental. Jojie has been engaged in the flower sales business since she really loves flowers. She has been in this business for 20 years and earns a monthly income of PHP 5,000. She has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC for 13 years.

loans.use: To purchase pots and flowers to sell

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en:
Naseem is a 37-year-old married woman living with her spouse and four children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She wants to take a loan to support her husband. He is a salesman. His daily practice is to take rubber bands from wholesalers and deliver them to the retailers via his bike. Nowadays, he observed, the household expenses are exceeding the income. So, he decided to increase his efforts regarding the business. Therefore, Naseem requested a loan so that her husband can buy rubber bands in a larger quantity to deliver to the retailers.

Naseem hopes that now her husband can easily establish his business and can contribute more to the household expenses than before. Naseem is very thankful to Kiva and field partner BRAC Pakistan

loans.use: To buy rubber bands to sell

loans.name: Diloromkhon

texts.ru: Дилоромхон добрая женщина. Ей 38 лет. Она замужем, но ее муж 7 лет назад уехал в Российскую Федерацию на заработки, но без вести пропал. Дилоромхон не знает, жив он или мертв. Она сама воспитывает и обеспечивает 5 детей. Дилоромхон с 1998 года занимается собственным бизнесом. Она продает ткани на местном рынке. Она приобретает свой товар со столичного рынка и продает на местном рынке. Она имеет свою торговую точку. В этом году у нее было много расходов, так как двое из ее дочерей учатся в университете, и она оплатила за их учебный договор. Она не имеет денег, для покупки товара, так как она нуждается обновления товара для нового сезона. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 10000 сомони для покупки тканей. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Diloromkhon is a kind woman of 38 years.  She is married, however, 7 years ago, her husband left to work in the Russian Federation and disappeared without a trace.  Diloromkhon does not know if he is dead or alive.  She is raising and supporting her five children by herself.  

Since 1998, Diloromkhon has been carrying out her own business of selling fabrics at the local market.  She purchases her merchandise in the capital city and sells it locally from her stall at the market.  This year, she had to pay for the university tuition of her two daughters.  She does not have any money to purchase new merchandise for the coming season.  She is asking for a loan of 10,000 somoni to purchase fabrics.  She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy fabrics to sell at the market

loans.name: Rehema

texts.en:
Rehema operates a fish-selling business. She mentioned seasonality as a challenge in the business and she dreams of becoming a wholesaler of fish in the future. 

With the KSHS 20,000, she wants to purchase sacks of fish for resale and she appreciates the great support of the previous loan. She joined Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fish for resale.

loans.name: Sergia

texts.en: Sergia is 51 years old. She is married and has nine children, eight of whom are still studying and one is now an adult. Her husband is a farmer. She lives in Siloy Calamba Misamis Occidental and has been engaged in the vegetable gardening business for 15 years, earning a monthly income of PHP 5,000. Sergia requested a new loan to purchase two sacks of fertilizers and pesticides for her garden. Sergia has been a CUMI member of Paglaum MPC for four years now.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pesticides for her garden

loans.name: Emerenciana

texts.en:
Emerenciana is married with one child. Emerenciana is 64 years old and lives in Goaw, Liloy, Zamboanga del Norte.

Emerenciana operates her sari-sari store to earn a living and has had this business for two months.  Each month, she earns 3,000 PHP doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 14900 for additional capital.

Emerenciana has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Emerenciana hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell

loans.name: Khosiyat

texts.ru: Эту милую леди с зелеными глазами зовут Хосият. Она из деревни города Вахдат. Хосият гордо носит имя жены и мамы. Она работает продавщицей продуктов питания в магазине города Вахдат. Хосият продает печение, пряники, прожженное, разные сладости и безалкогольные напитки. Хосият планирует взять кредит и пополнить свои полки новыми товарами, в том числе тортами, хлебобулочными изделиями и разными видами конфет. Таким способом она расширит свою деятельность и увеличит свой доход. Хосият надеется на Вашу доброту!
texts.en: They call this lovely lady with green eyes, Khosiyat.  She is from a village of Vahdat, where she works at a grocery store selling cookies, cakes, various sweets and soft drinks.  Khosiyat is proud to tell everyone that she is a wife and a mother.  Khosiyat is asking for a loan so she can fill her shelves with cakes, breads and an assortment of candy.  With this approach, she is hoping to expand her business and to increase her profit.  Khosiyat is hoping for your kindness!

loans.use: To expand the assortment of her merchandise

loans.name: Vera

texts.en:
Vera is a 61-year-old married mother of one child. She has been working in the education sector for the last 15 years. In 2010, she started working as a tutor from her house, as a step towards having her own business and developing her family's living. 

Vera is acquiring a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua to pay for her child's increasing school fees. 

She supports her husband and family a lot and she works hard to provide them with anything they might need. Vera hopes to stay in good health to keep on supporting her family.

loans.use: To pay for her child's school fees

loans.name: Karam Group

texts.en:
Ernalyn is the featured borrower of Karam's group. She and the other two group members are partnering to acquire a loan from Kiva's partner, Al Majmoua, because they have been friends since they came to work in Lebanon as housekeepers. They came to Lebanon to earn money to provide their families with the best education and a better living.

Ernalyn misses her hometown in the Philippines, but she insists on working hard to support her family. Her loan from Al Majmoua will be sent to her children to pay for their school fees.

Ernalyn is the woman in the center of the picture, with a white top. Lilibeth is on the left with a light green top, and Maribeth is on the right with a red shirt.

loans.use: to pay her children's school fees.

loans.name: Nodira

texts.ru: Нодира жизнерадостная женщина с юга Таджикистана. Ей 35 лет. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 2 детей. Ее дети учатся в средней школе. Нодира для того, чтобы обеспечить своих детей со всеми необходимыми средствами несколько лет назад начала свой бизнес купле продажей детской одежды. Ее муж трудовой мигрант в Российской Федерации и не отправляет регулярно денег, поэтому Нодира надеется только на свой доход. Нодира всегда мечтала, чтобы ее дети жили в хороших условиях. Однако ее дом имеет плохое состояние и нуждается в капитальном ремонте. Нодира планирует до наступления зимы отремонтировать свой дом. Она хочет, чтобы Новый год они встретили в уютном доме. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 4000 сомони для покупки строительных материалов, как краски, шпаклевки, обои и т.п. для ремонта дома. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Nodira is a cheerful woman from the south of Tajikistan.  She is 35 years old, married and has two children.  Her kids are attending high school.  In order  to provide all of the necessities for them, a few years ago, Nodira started her own business of selling children's clothing.  She is hoping that her income will cover all of the needed expenses.  Her husband is working abroad in the Russian Federation but does not send back money regularly.  

Nodira has always dreamed of her children living in good conditions.  However, her house is in bad need of repairs.  Nodira is planning to fix her house before the winter arrives.  She hopes to celebrate the New Years in a home that is warm and cozy.  She is asking for a loan for 4,000 somoni to purchase building materials such as paint, plaster and wall paper.  She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials so she can repair her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase a water tank.

loans.name: Anabelle

texts.en:
Anabelle, age 32, is happy tending her little store. She is married with four kids and her husband is a tricycle driver. The store is their other means of  income. Fortunately, Anabelle's store is located in a populated neighborhood, so she achieves good daily sales. The store continues to be successful even though there is increased competition from other stores. She believes that, with PMPC's support, they will sustain their business and beat the competition.  

Anabelle has been a member of Paglaum MPC for one year. She has applied for a loan of PHP 7,000 for the store. Expanding her inventory will mean additional income. She has confidence that she can continue as a member in good standing. Anabelle is a hardworking mother and wishes to manage the store so that she can provide a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks of groceries for her sari-sari store (general store).

loans.name: Dominic

texts.en:
Dominic grew up in the Muthurwa estate of Nairobi, Kenya with his mother and three siblings. He ventured into the car wash business immediately after high school since he wasn't able to go to college and needed a source of income to help with his family's upkeep. He has been washing cars for a living for the past three years. When he found the opportunity to invest in Fresh Life toilets, he took keen interest and thought of it as a good source of additional income. 

Dominic wishes to use the Fresh Life toilets to create employment opportunities for other youth once his franchise grows. He, therefore, seeks a loan to help him purchase and run one Fresh Life toilet.

loans.use: To purchase and run one Fresh Life toilet

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a widowed woman and has been blessed with three children. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past three years, she has operated a retail shop, selling household consumables like wheat flour, rice and cooking oil. She cites seasonality as her major challenge in the business. 

Maria is requesting Kshs 30,000 to boost her kiosk by purchasing bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves and cooking fat. She dreams of expanding to a wholesale shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase wheat flour, maize flour, tea leaves and cooking fat.

loans.name: Dilovar

texts.ru: Диловар живет в районе Хамадони. Ему 39 лет. Он имеет высшее образование и последние три года работает в микро кредитном депозитном организации в качестве кредитного офицера. Жена Диловара домохозяйка, а дочь и сыновья учатся в школе. Таким образом Диловар единственный кормилец семьи. Он решил начать собственный бизнес и будет совмещать со своей основной работой. Диловар давно интересуется купле-продажей крупнорогатого скота. У него при дворе дома имеется коровник. Диловар накопил сбережение в размере 1500 долларов и еще просит в кредит 2100 долларов. Он на сумму кредита и сбережения планирует купить 5 голов коров и телят, а также корм для скота. Жена Диловара будет помогать ему в бизнесе. В его отсутствии она будет кормить и поить скот. Для Диловара этот кредит очень важен. Ведь он будет обеспечивать семью не только молоком и мясом, но и дополнительным доходом.
texts.en:
Dilovar lives in Hamadoni.  He is 39 years old.  He has a university education and for the last three years, he has been working at a microfinance bank as a loan manager.  Dilovar's wife is a homemaker, and his daughter and sons attend school.  Currently, Dilovar is the only breadwinner in the family.  He decided to start his own business that he will run in parallel with his regular work.  For a while now, Dilovar has been interested in cattle sales.  He has a cowshed in his yard. 

Dilovar saved 1,500 dollars and is asking for a loan of 2,100 dollars.  He is planning to use this money to purchase five cows, calves and some feed.  Dilovar's wife will be helping him run this business.  During his absence, she will feed and water the animals.  This loan is very important to Dilovar, since he is providing his family not only with milk, but also with a supplemental income.

loans.use: To purchase 5 cows, calves and some feed.

loans.name: Hermes Guadalupe

texts.es: Hermes vive con su familia en casa propia, el se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia posee mucha clientela que lo prefieren por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas cubre algunos gastos e su hogar, Hermes está solicitando un crédito para la compra de frutas y verduras por mayor como tomates, cebollas, papayas, papas, etc. y así poder seguir con su negocio y poderle dar a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Hermes lives with his family in the home they own. He sells fruits and vegetables out of his home. He has a lot of customers who prefer him because of his good prices and friendly demeanor at the store. His profits are enough to cover some of the costs of his home. Hermes is asking for a loan to buy fruits and vegetables at wholesale, like tomatoes, onions, papayas, potatoes, etc. This way he can continue with his business and be able to give his family what they need without limitations.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables at wholesale, like tomatoes, onions, papayas, potatoes, etc.

loans.name: Maritza Del Carmen

texts.es: Maritza, vive en un barrio en donde los habitantes son de escasos recursos económicos y las viviendas son muy humildes, ella se ha dedicado a la venta de granos básicos en uno de los mercados de Managua, por medio de este pequeño negocio mantiene sus gastos principales del hogar. Hoy en día solicita su crédito para poder continuar con una tercera etapa de mejoramiento de su vivienda, como es poner cerámica al piso en el área de la cocina y el baño,  con el préstamo podrá comprar los materiales como cerámica, cemento, de esta manera Maritza irá mejorando sus condiciones de vida, logrado mayor higiene y orden  en su casa.
texts.en: Maritza lives in a low-income neighborhood with humble homes. She sells basic grains in one of the markets in Managua, and through this small business covers the main costs of her home. Today she asks for a loan to be able to continue with the third stage of home improvements, laying ceramic tile on the floor of the kitchen and bathroom. With the loan she will be able to buy materials like tile and cement, so that she can continue improving her living conditions, with better hygiene and order in her home.

loans.use: to buy ceramic and cement.

loans.name: Tadzhikhon

texts.ru: Таджихон родилась в 1951 года. Она вдова и имеет 5 детей. Таджихон имеет высшее образование. Она в течение многих лет работала агрономом. Данное время она пенсионерка и дома занимается предоставлением услуги швеи, так как она очень опытная портниха. Таджихон любит своё дело и с удовольствием выполняет ее. Ее невестка помогает ей введению бизнеса. Таджихон последнее время много болеет. Она должна лечиться, так как врачи предупредили ее о серьёзности ее болезни. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 6200 сомони для покупки лекарства для лечения. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Tadzhikhon was born in 1951.  She is a widow and has five children.  Tadzhikhon has a university education and for many years she had worked as an agronomist.  Currently, she is retired and works as a seamstress as well as a tailor.  Tadzhikhon loves her work and performs it with pleasure.  Her daughter-in-law helps her run the business.  Recently, Tadzhikhon has fallen ill.  She has a serious condition which requires treatment.  She is asking for a loan of 6,200 somoni to purchase medicine to treat herself.  She is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: To buy medicine to treat herself

loans.name: Kholbiby

texts.ru: Холбиби несколько лет назад потеряла своего мужа, так как он был болен. Ей 47 лет. Она кормилица 2 детей. Она свет в жизни детей и единственная надежда для них. Холбиби 5 лет назад начала свой бизнес купле продажей риса на местном рынке. Она имеет свою торговую точку на местном рынке. Ее сын помогает ей введению бизнеса. Она имеет своих постоянных клиентов и поэтому хочет увеличить свой оборотный капитал. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 5000 сомони для покупки риса для пополнения оборотного капитала. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: A few years ago, Kholbiby lost her husband to illness.  She is 47 years old and is raising two children.  She is both the sun and the hope for her children.  Five years ago, Kholbiby started her own business of selling rice at the local market where she has her own stall.  Her son is helping her with running this business.  She has a set of permanent clients, and she wants to expand her working capital.  She is asking for a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase rice to replenish her stocks.  She is waiting for your kindness and is hoping for your generosity.

loans.use: To buy rice to replenish her stocks and to increase her working capital

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is a married woman with five children, all of whom attend school. She rents a house that has no electricity or piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for the family and school fees for the children.

For the past year, she has operated a charcoal-selling business. She sells from her home to her neighbours and passersby. Her major challenge in the business is the high cost of transportation. With the loan she wants to purchase six bags of charcoal for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase six bags of charcoal for resale.

loans.name: Maryam

texts.en:
Maryam is a 28-year old married woman, who lives with her husband and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband owns a bike rental business where he rents out motorbikes to the general people. He has been doing this work for many years. It requires him to stay at the shop to deal with his customers. He wants to buy a new bike to meet demand but has not been able to purchase one due to the high cost.

This will be Maryam's first loan with Kiva, and she hopes that, with your cooperation, her husband will be able to carry out his plans. She promises to make his payments on time. 

Maryam thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: To buy an additional bike to rent out to the general public.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулнора добросовестная женщина. Ей 43 года. Она 23 года назад потеряла своего мужа. Ее муж погиб в автокатастрофе. Она осталась вдовой с маленьким ребенком. Гулнора не вышла больше замуж и посвятила всю свою жизнь своему сыну. Данное время ее сыну 24 года. Гулнора работает в заводе по разработки алюминий. Она является одной из успешных работников. Гулнора получает маленькую зарплату и с трудом справляется с семейными расходами. Она имеет очень хорошую сестру, которая собирается выйти замуж. Гулнора желает добра и счастья своей сестре и поэтому она хочет помочь своей сестре, для того, чтобы организовать ее свадебное торжество. Гулнора запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для проведения свадебного торжества ее сестры. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Gulnora is a conscientious 43-year-old woman. Twenty-three years ago she lost her husband in a car accident. She became a widow with a small child. She did not marry again, and instead devoted her life to her son who is now 24 years old. 

Gulnora works in an aluminum factory, where she is one of the most successful employees. She receives a small salary and has difficulty covering her family's expenses. She has a very good sister who is getting married. Gulnora wishes her sister good luck and wants to help by organizing her wedding reception. She is requesting a loan of 2,000 TJS for it, and waits for your kindness.

loans.use: To plan a wedding reception for her sister.

loans.name: Guljahon

texts.ru: Гулчахон порядочная женщина. Ей 46 лет. Она разведена и имеет 4 детей. Много лет назад ее муж бросил ее с 4 детьми и не помогал по содержанию детей. Она работала в средней школе учительницей и получала маленькую зарплату. Таким образом, с большим трудом она вырастила своих детей. Двое ее дочери замужем, и имеют своё домохозяйство. Двое ее сыновья учатся в средней школе. Она хочет, чтобы ее дети получили высшее образование и стали высококвалифицированными специалистами. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2700 сомони для оплаты учебного договора своей дочери, которая учится в университете. Она ждет вашу доброту и надеется на ваше милосердие.
texts.en: Guljahon is a respectable woman.  She is 46 years old, widowed and is raising four children.  Many years ago, her husband left her and her children and did not help them financially.  At the time, she had been working as a school teacher and was receiving a small salary.  With great difficulty, she was able to raise her children.  Two of her daughters are now married and are running their own households.  Two of her sons are studying in high school.  She wants her children to receive university education and to become qualified specialists.  She is asking for a loan of 2700 somoni to pay for her daughter's university tuition.  She is waiting for your kindness and is hoping for your generosity.

loans.use: To pay for the education of her daughter

loans.name: Musallam

texts.ru: Мусаллам родилась в 1968 года. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет 3 детей. Ее муж простой фермер. Мусаллам более 12 лет занимается садоводством. Она имеет абрикосовый сад. Она продает свой продукт, как в свежем виде, так и в виде сухо фрукта. Мусаллам всегда мечтала иметь высшее образование, но ее мечта не сбылась. Теперь она старается, чтобы ее дети получили высшее образование. Сын Мусаллама учится в Военной Академии Республики Таджикистана. Она должна оплатить за учебный договор своего сына, но не имеет денег. Она запрашивает займ для оплаты учебного договора своего сына. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Musallam was born in 1968. She is married and raising three children. Her husband is a simple farmer. Musallam has been a gardener for more than 12 years and has an apricot orchard. She sells both fresh and dried apricots. 

She always dreamed of getting a higher education, but never realized that dream. Now she wants to ensure that her children get a higher education. Her son studies in the Military Academy of the Republic of Tajikistan. She doesn't have the money to pay her son's school tuition, and so is asking for a loan to be able to pay them. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To pay for her son's education expenses.

loans.name: Jose Mario

texts.es: José de 41 años de edad vive en casa de su padre junto con su familia, desde hace 15 años posee una tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela porque tiene surtido su negocio y los clientes siempre encuentran lo que buscan, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, Don José está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más mercadería como granos básicos, aceite, golosinas, azúcar, shampoo, etc. y asi obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: José, 41, lives with his family in his father's house. For 15 years he has run a store in his home. He has a lot of customers because he keeps his business stocked and people always find what they are looking for. With the profits from his sales he is able to cover some of the costs of his home. José is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise like basic grains, oil, snacks, sugar, shampoo, etc so that he can earn more money to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, oil, snacks, sugar, shampoo, etc.

loans.name: Komila

texts.ru: Комила жизнерадостная женщина. Она замужем и на воспитании имеет одного сына. Ее сыну 18 лет. Муж Комилы работает в средней школе и получает маленькую зарплату. Комила взяла обеспечение семьи на себя, так как ее муж зарабатывает слишком мало денег. Комила занимается выращивание сельхоз культур как картофель, пшеница и т.п. Она более 19 лет занимается этим бизнесом. Комила и ее семья живут в старом домике, который имеет плохое состояние. Она хочет отремонтировать свой дом. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 650 долларов США для покупки строительных материалов для ремонта дома. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Komila is a cheerful woman who is married with one 18-year-old son. Her husband works in a high school and earns a small salary. Komila took over providing for the family because her husband makes too little money.

For over 19 years she has farmed crops like potatoes, wheat, etc.. Komila and her family live in a small old house which is poorly constructed. She wants to repair it, and has asked for a loan of US$650 to buy the building supplies. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: To buy building materials to repair her house.

loans.name: Hexiell Abigail

texts.es: Hexiell de 31 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo y su hijo de 6 años de edad, ella posee una pequeña tienda en su lugar de residencia, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de su esposo logran solventar los gastos que se les presentan en su hogar. Hexiell está solicitando un crédito para la compra de granos básicos, azúcar, aceite, golosinas, etc. para poder surtir mas su negocio y así obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitaciones alguna.
texts.en:
Hexiell, 31 years old, lives in her own home with her spouse and her six-year-old child. She has a small shop in her home. With what she makes off her sales and with the help of her spouse, she manages to pay for their household expenses.

Hexiell is requesting a loan to buy bulk grains, sugar, oil, candies, etc., in order to better stock her business and make better earnings. This will allow her to give her family what they need without any limitations.

loans.use: to buy bulk grains, sugar, oil, candies, etc.

loans.name: Carlos Leonel

texts.es:
Carlos  de 38 años de edad, sus estudios los realizo hasta 9° grado, el motivo por el cual, no pudo seguir estudiando; es por que en ese tiempo no existía el nivel de bachillerato, desde entonce comenzó a trabajar en la agricultura y en la albañilería con su padre; luego con el tiempo se independizo realizando su propio trabajo de construir casas y de remodelación. 

Su familia esta conformada, por su esposa que se dedica a la venta de productos por catalogo  y han procreado 4 hijos; dos varones que se encuentran en los estados unidos y los otros dos están con ellos, uno de los que están con ellos, estudia en la escuela, que esta cerca  escuela, el pequeño  pasa con su mamá. 


En la construcción de viviendas y remodelación de las mismas, lo viene realizando desde hace 14 años;  oficio que aprendió por parte de su padre, quien le enseño y en su tiempo libre trabaja en la agricultura en la siembra del frijol y del maíz.


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar materiales para terminar una parte de la casa que es el techo de la cochera. Con esto mejorara en mucho, porque así podrá vender la casa y tener un mejor ingreso.
 
 Carlos piensa en instalar un negocio propio en el pueblo  y que los niños terminen sus estudios
texts.en:
Carlos is 38 years old and studied until the 9th grade. He wasn't able to continue to study after that because high school didn't exist at the time. He then began to work in agriculture and construction with his father. Later, with time, he became independent and began to do his own work building houses and doing remodelling. 

Carlos's family is made up of his wife, who works selling products from a catalogue, and their four children. They have two boys who are in the United States and the other two children are with them. One of the children that lives with them goes to school, which is close to their home, and the little one stays with his mother.

Carlos has been building and remodelling homes for 14 years. He learned this trade from his father, who taught him. In his free time, Carlos works in agriculture, growing beans and corn.

He is requesting this loan from Fundación Campo in order to buy materials to finish a part of his house - the roof of the garage. This will improve things a lot, because he will be able to sell the house and have a better income in this way.

Carlos plans to start his own business in his village, and hopes that his children finish their studies.

loans.use: to buy materials to finish building the roof of his garage.

loans.name: Blanca

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 46 años, es casada y vive en su casa propia hecha de material noble junto a su esposo e hijos.
Su trabajo y principal actividad es la agricultura puesto que desde muy joven no tenía conocimientos de otro oficio y  fue un oficio que aprendió desde muy niña por sus padres. Cuenta permanentemente con el apoyo de su Esposo e hijos en labores menores haciendo de este un oficio familiar.Cuenta con dos hectáreas de terreno que sus padres le cedieron y donde posee una variedad de productos como cacao orgánico, café, barbasco y árboles frutales. Le agrada mantener en buen estado sus cultivos y desempeña una agricultura responsable haciendo uso exclusivo de abono orgánico. Suele contratar trabajadores para que le apoyen a realizar tareas complicadas como el retiro de maleza y cosecha de sus productos ya que es la única manera de agilizar las tareas pendientes.
Es el tercer préstamo que solicita con Kiva y se siente agradecida por el apoyo financiero que recibe para seguir adelante, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual. Desea en esta oportunidad contar con 1,000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
Blanca, 46, is married and, together with her husband and children, lives in her own home made of solid materials. She has been a farmer since a very young age, a trade that she learned from her parents, and the only job she knows. She always has the support of her husband and children in the small tasks required of this job. She has two hectares of land that her parents gave her, and grows a variety of products like organic cacao, coffee, barbasco and tree fruits. She likes keeping her crops in good condition and practices responsible agriculture using only organic compost. She usually hires laborers to do the complicated tasks like weeding and harvesting the crops, since that is the only way to streamline the work.

This is her third Kiva loan and she feels grateful for the financial support that she receives to continue moving forward. She promises to make her payments punctually. She would like to have 1000 PEN to buy organic compost.

loans.use: to buy organic compost.

loans.name: Farishtamo

texts.ru:
Фариштамо жительница района Фархор. Ей 54 года. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Ее старший сын находится на заработках в России. Дочка и младший сын Фариштамо живут вместе с ней. Фариштамо домохозяйка. Ее муж работает на поле. Он имеет 4 гектаров земли, где занимается растениеводством. Фариштамо ему помогает. 
    Фариштамо взяв пример со своих соседей и земляков решила начать свой бизнес по покупке и продаже крупнорогатых скотов. В Таджикистане основные деятельности является скотоводство и растениеводство. Фариштамо просит кредит, чтобы приобрести маленьких скотов.
